DOC.brief_summary: A Double-blind Study Pharmacokinetic Properties BIOD-238 BIOD-250 Compared Humalog® Subjects Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Injection Site Toleration BIOD-238 BIOD-250 Compared Humalog® Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study assess speed absorption BIOD-238 BIOD-250 compare Humalog® . Secondary objective assess pharmacokinetic characteristic BIOD-238 BIOD-250 compare Humalog® , evaluate safety tolerability BIOD-238 BIOD-250 compare Humalog® .
DOC.criteria: Age : ≥18 ≤70 year Body Mass Index : ≥18 ≤35 kg/m2 Diagnosed Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus least 1 year Type 2 diabetes mellitus Serum Cpeptide > 1.0 ng/mL HbA1c > 10.0 % History hypersensitivity component study medication Treatment investigational drug last 30 day dose . Current drug alcohol abuse , history drug alcohol abuse opinion Investigator impair subject safety , protocol compliance , interpretation study result . Caffeine , nicotine alcohol addiction might expect result withdrawal symptom course study dose day would fall category .
